description: The third of director Ti West's explorations of cinema, sex, violence and the lust for fame imitates its '80s setting a little too well, prioritizing style over substance.
title: ‘MaXXXine’ Review: Throwback Horror Gets a Little Stuck In Its Hot Tub Time Machine

description: The last decade has seen the explosion of the rosé wine industry worldwide, but orange wines are the next frontier. And one of France’s most renowned winemakers has made it his mission to make orange wines go mainstream.
title: Meet the French Winemaker Who Is Betting Big on Orange Wine

description: Within the next 15 years, the original versions of Superman, Batman, the Joker and Wonder Woman will all enter the public domain due to copyright expiration.
title: As Superman and Batman Enter the Public Domain, Hollywood Faces Opportunities and Risks

description: Art is supposed to last a lifetime, but that can’t happen if works are neglected and allowed to deteriorate.
title: How Serious Art Collectors Care for Their Collections
